CONTRACT_ID: Inuit snow removal project in Iqaluit
short_summary: Snow Removal, lot maintenance, Gravel Grading
description: This is the description of the procurement for the snow removal project. It details the different tasks and services that are required for the project. These services include snow removal, lot maintenance, and gravel grading. The contract period will be from the date of contract to August 31, 2024.
